name: datatables.net/datatables.net-rowreorder-bs4
description: RowReorder adds end user reordering of rows in a DataTable through click-and-drag mouse and touch operations. RowReorder provides full support for Editor allowing end users to update sequential information in a fast and easy manner. This is RowReorder for DataTables with styling for [Bootstrap4](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.6/getting-started/introduction/)
